name: Apotheosis
description:
Apotheosis is a 1 vs 1 shmup combat game that features 4 playable characters each with their own unique move and play style.

In a world of deities, the Summoners are magical beings from mythology that may not be so mythical. Each Summoner is able to call upon the ethereal Light to throw constructs of their own making at their opponents.

Apotheosis is the tournament of Summoners that takes place when the reigning King of Gods dies. Summoners from all over come to participate in the tournament that will enhance their powers beyond all measure. Each Summoner has their own reason for fighting and each will stop at nothing to be crowned the next King of Gods.

Apotheosis was developed by Team Khopesh.

Sam Von Ehren - Lead Programmer & Game Designer

Christian Sutton - Lead Designer & Programmer

Danny Nanni - Creative Director & Game Designer

Apotheosis is available now for PC/Mac

Requires PS4/Xbox/Gamepad Controllers
